sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-card>
      <v-row>
        <v-col cols="12" sm="6" md="4">
          <v-text-field label="Search" v-model="message"></v-text-field>
          <v-btn @click="change()" v-if="rand">submit</v-btn>
          
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
    </v-card>
</template>
<script>
import axios from 'axios';


export default {

  data: () => {
    return {}

  },
  methods : {
    async change() {
      console.log(this.message)
      await axios.post(`http://127.0.0.1:40193/search`, {
        Key: this.message
      }).then(response => {
        this.$emit("funSearchSender", response)
      })
    }
  }

}
</script>
